name: CF_Cache_Mon
description: Chrome extension to View loaded resource headers and check CloudFlare CDN cache settings.
author: Xim S

scripts.prep: npm run clean && mkdir dist\cf_cache_mon && xcopy js\* dist\cf_cache_mon\js /E /Y /D /i && xcopy css\* dist\cf_cache_mon\css /E /Y /D /i && xcopy icons\* dist\cf_cache_mon\icons /E /Y /D /i && xcopy jq\* dist\cf_cache_mon\jq /E /Y /D /i && copy cf_cache_mon.html dist\cf_cache_mon\ && copy *.json dist\cf_cache_mon\ && copy README.* dist\cf_cache_mon\
